attributes.action: Stop large corporations imposing onerous Terms and Conditions on small business.
attributes.background: Large corporations and businesses expect payment for their services in 30 days, but they don't want to pay their contractors within the same time scale for work carried out or goods supplied. Contractors could wait anything up to 90 days for payment.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The terms and conditions which businesses use are the responsibility of individual businesses.
